products.title: Nobis Softshade Gold Day and Night Blind
products.metadescription: Nobis Softshade Gold Day and Night Blind in Cream/Yellow. Made to measure from £40.55 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Day and Night Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The Nobis Softshade Gold Day and Night Roller Blind offers grey flexibility for light control in any living, work or sleep space. With a design featuring quality polyester and sheer voile panels, you can retain a sense of seclusion whilst allowing plenty of natural light into your home.
 
 Product ID: DB-VRBX1871 Fabric Colour: Gold Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Brackets     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER1 - Lowest Energy Saving Value - Due to Blind Type or Fabric Light Filtering: Yes
